doc.doc:summary: The allowable (min, max) speed range for fixed-fan mode. 0.0..=1.0
doc.doc:para: This is a constraint on clients who attempt to set the speed, not a constraint of the hardware. This means that GetThermalInfo may return a fixed fan speed outside this range.
The returned values will not change throughout the connection's lifetime.
